links.title: The JSON representation of the landing page for this OGC (geospatial) API Service providing links to the API definition, the conformance declaration and information about the data collections offered at this endpoint.

The ECON representation of the landing page for this OGC (geospatial) API Service providing links to the API definition, the conformance declaration and information about the data collections offered at this endpoint.
